definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to serve the ball/to tee off

sentences.english: He can hold the ball, and be a target man.
sentences.chinese: 他可以护住球，也能成为一个目标男。

sentences.english: It appears, however, that the "drag coefficient", CD, also depends on the velocity of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 然而，阻力系数CD，也取决于球的速度。

sentences.english: Right-handed batters usually hit to left field.
sentences.chinese: 右撇子击球手把球打到左外野。

sentences.english: Eight-year old Akram plays marbles with his friends in south of Kabul, capital of Afghanistan, in Nov. 2010.
sentences.chinese: 月，在阿富汗首都喀布尔，阿克拉姆与朋友们玩儿球。

sentences.english: They bandied the ball from player to player while they waited the game to start.
sentences.chinese: 他们在等比赛开始的时候把球在队员之间来回传递。

sentences.english: For the sphere, that unique geometry is the perfectly spherical sphere.
sentences.chinese: 对于球来说，这个唯一的几何就是正圆球面。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the usefulness of keratoplasty with the patients of symblepharon after burns.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察角膜移植治疗烧伤后睑球粘连的效果。

sentences.english: He thanked his teammates for getting him the basketball in the right spots.
sentences.chinese: 他感谢他的队友把球传到他接得最舒服的位置。

sentences.english: An outdoor game in which the players drive wooden balls through a series of wickets using long-handled mallets.
sentences.chinese: 一种游戏选手通过一系列环绕来打击一个木头球。

sentences.english: First hold the nail with the wide head by its shaft and push it head-first into the ball of clay.
sentences.chinese: 首先将宽头钉的杆竖起，将其头朝下推入橡皮泥球。

sentences.english: Objective To enhance the knowledge of pulmonary aspergilloma on CT and chest radiography.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对肺曲菌球CT和胸片表现的认识。

sentences.english: It took three putts before he got the ball in the hole.
sentences.chinese: 他轻轻打了三下才把球打进洞。

sentences.english: The ball will bound back when it is thrown on the pole.
sentences.chinese: 球抛在柱上会弹回来的。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Liyan Ice Bar on bulbar paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察利咽冰棒配合针刺治疗球麻痹的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Since the football has lost air, we shall need a pump to inflate it.
sentences.chinese: 这个球漏气了，我们需要一个气筒打气。

definition: to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to serve the ball/to tee off
sports such as ping-pong and badminton that use small balls/see also 大球[da4 qiu2]
